requiredSkills: Understanding of Data Privacy Laws (e.g., GDPR, PDPA in Sri Lanka)
A background in Law or Data Governance
futureOutlook: This is a very new and forward-looking role. As Sri Lanka implements its Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) and companies collect more user data, the need for professionals who can ensure data is used ethically and legally will become critical. This role combines elements of law, technology, and ethics and will likely become a key position in large, data-driven organizations.
